channel.title: CVE Feed for baserproject -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for baserproject -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25655|2024-08-02T11:25:19.267Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a Content Management system. Prior to version 4.7.5, any file may be uploaded on the management system of baserCMS. Version 4.7.5 contains a patch.

item.title: CVE-2023-43649|2024-08-02T19:44:43.824Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 4.8.0, there is a cross site request forgery vulnerability in the content preview feature of baserCMS. Version 4.8.0 contains a patch for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-25654|2024-08-02T11:25:19.263Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a Content Management system. Prior to version 4.7.5, there is a Remote Code Execution (RCE) Vulnerability in the management system of baserCMS. Version 4.7.5 contains a patch.

item.title: CVE-2023-43792|2024-08-02T19:52:11.262Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. In versions 4.6.0 through 4.7.6, there is a Code Injection vulnerability in the mail form of baserCMS. As of time of publication, no known patched versions are available.

item.title: CVE-2023-29009|2024-08-02T14:00:14.347Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework with WebAPI that runs on PHP8 and CakePHP4. There is a XSS Vulnerability in Favorites Feature to baserCMS. This issue has been patched in version 4.8.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-43647|2024-08-02T19:44:43.846Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 4.8.0, there is a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the file upload feature of baserCMS. Version 4.8.0 contains a patch for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-43648|2024-08-02T19:44:44.245Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 4.8.0, there is a Directory Traversal Vulnerability in the form submission data management feature of baserCMS. Version 4.8.0 contains a patch for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-44379|2024-07-05T17:21:55.451Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 5.0.9, there is a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the site search feature. Version 5.0.9 contains a fix for this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-51450|2024-07-05T17:21:55.047Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 5.0.9, there is an OS Command Injection vulnerability in the site search feature of baserCMS. Version 5.0.9 contains a fix for this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-26128|2024-02-22T18:32:43.866Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 5.0.9, there is a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the content management feature. Version 5.0.9 contains a fix for this vulnerability.

item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 5.0.9, there is a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the site search feature. Version 5.0.9 contains a fix for this vulnerability.

item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 5.0.9, there is an OS Command Injection vulnerability in the site search feature of baserCMS. Version 5.0.9 contains a fix for this vulnerability.

item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Prior to version 5.0.9, there is a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the content management feature. Version 5.0.9 contains a fix for this vulnerability.
